trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Definisce metodi per la lettura delle parti di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain a reference to an object that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come ottenere un riferimento a un oggetto che implementa questa interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> in order to access <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> per accedere a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> parti un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> readers for each document in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un insieme di lettori <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> per ogni documento in un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> readers, one for each document in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Insieme di lettori <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> per ogni documento in un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader.FixedDocuments%2A> property to obtain a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> readers.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader.FixedDocuments%2A> proprietà per ottenere una raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> lettori.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reader for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un reader per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> con l'[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />, if one exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />, se esiste, associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that contains the default printing options for the sequence; or <see langword="null" />, if no print ticket exists for the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che contiene le opzioni predefinite di stampa per la sequenza; o <see langword="null" /> se non esiste nessun ticket di stampa per il documento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] sequence, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> fa parte di un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] sequenza, vedere il capitolo 2 nella [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: Gets the thumbnail image, if one exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'immagine in anteprima, se esiste, associata a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the sequence.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> che rappresenta il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per la sequenza.
